voxy_extra.config.fix_nether_fog.tooltip: Disables nether fog with environmental fog enabled.
voxy_extra.config.save_old_lods.tooltip: Enables copying LoDs to special Flashback folder (doesn't support combining replays). If turned off, LoDs location will be written to metadata instead, which can't be ingested in the replay.
voxy_extra.config.flashback_ingest.toolt: Enables ingesting in compatible Flashback replays (which have LoDs copied).
voxy_extra.config.server_blacklist.toolt: Allows blacklisting servers to disable Voxy in them (manually add to server_blacklist_list in voxy-extra.json, format: ["IP", "IP"]).
